# The `InternalizePass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A pass that internalizes all functions and variables other than those that must be preserved according to <code>MustPreserveGV</code>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::InternalizePass</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A pass that internalizes all functions and variables other than those that must be preserved according to <code>MustPreserveGV</code>.

Definition at line 36 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/internalize-h">Internalize.h</a>.
